beers.description: Taco IPA. 6.8% Brewed with agrist of malted barley, flaked maize, and house-made tortilla chips. Brewed with lime zest and juice, coriander, cilantro, cracked black pepper, sea salt, cumin, and pasilla chiles. Dry hopped with Citra, and New Zealand Motueka conditioned on mango puree, double dry hopped with Simcoe.
beers.summary: Taco IPA. 6.8% Brewed with agrist of malted barley, flaked maize, and house-made tortilla chips. Brewed with lime zest and juice, coriander, cilantro, cracked black pepper, sea salt, cumin, and pasilla chiles. Dry hopped with Citra, and New Zealand Motueka conditioned on mango puree, double dry hopped with Simcoe.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #19. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #19. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of over ripe mango, peach sorbet, grapefruit pith, and blood orange bitters.
beers.description: Double IPA 9.0% Brewed with fluffy oats and caramel malts. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Galaxy and Crystal. Conditioned atop careless heaps of lush pink guava, pineapple and apricot puree. Then dry hopped with Galaxy and Citra.
beers.summary:
Double IPA 9.0% Brewed with fluffy oats and caramel malts. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Galaxy and Crystal. Conditioned atop careless heaps of lush pink guava, pineapple and apricot puree. Then dry hopped with Galaxy and Citra.
Notes of over ripe mango, peach sorbet, grapefruit pith, and blood orange bitters.

beers.notes: Notes of pink lady apple, lively prosecco, petit fours, orchard breeze.
beers.description: Asian Pear Saison. 6.0% Brewed with jasmine rice. Hopped in the kettle with Melba and Black Peppercorns. Conditioned on heaps of Asian Pear puree.
beers.summary:
Asian Pear Saison. 6.0% Brewed with jasmine rice. Hopped in the kettle with Melba and Black Peppercorns. Conditioned on heaps of Asian Pear puree.
Notes of pink lady apple, lively prosecco, petit fours, orchard breeze.

beers.notes: Notes of macaroon, frozen cocktail with tiny umbrella, lemongrass, and coral.
beers.description: Coconut White Bier: Brewed with raw wheat and oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Melba, Cascade and Coriander. Fermented with our saison yeast and one of our favorite Brett strains then gently conditioned on a delicate amount of toasted coconut.
beers.summary:
Coconut White Bier: Brewed with raw wheat and oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Melba, Cascade and Coriander. Fermented with our saison yeast and one of our favorite Brett strains then gently conditioned on a delicate amount of toasted coconut.
Notes of macaroon, frozen cocktail with tiny umbrella, lemongrass, and coral.

beers.notes: Notes of fresh cut grass, citrus leaves, papaya flesh, and dank greenery.
beers.description: Wet Hop IPA 6.0%  Brewed with oats. Aggressively hopped with an enormous amount of Hallertau Blanc wet hops hand selected by Jean during his trip to Germany.
beers.summary:
Wet Hop IPA 6.0%  Brewed with oats. Aggressively hopped with an enormous amount of Hallertau Blanc wet hops hand selected by Jean during his trip to Germany.
Notes of fresh cut grass, citrus leaves, papaya flesh, and dank greenery.

beers.notes: Notes of orange marmalade, raw honeycomb, dry riesling, and tundra grass.
beers.description: German IPA 6.1% Brewed entirely with German Pilsner malt. Hopped in the kettle solely with Hallertau Blanc then assertively dry hopped with Hallertau Mittelfruh and more Hallertau Blanc. Was immer du tun oder traumen kannst, beginne es.
beers.summary:
German IPA 6.1% Brewed entirely with German Pilsner malt. Hopped in the kettle solely with Hallertau Blanc then assertively dry hopped with Hallertau Mittelfruh and more Hallertau Blanc. Was immer du tun oder traumen kannst, beginne es.
Notes of orange marmalade, raw honeycomb, dry riesling, and tundra grass.

beers.notes: Notes of vanilla flowers, peach gummies, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.
beers.description: Cream Ale. 5.4% Brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
beers.summary:
Cream Ale. 5.4% Brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
Notes of vanilla flowers, peach gummies, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.
